document.title: WEL Introduction
document.paragraph:
WEL is an encapsulation of the Win32 Application Programming Interface (API), and provides users with a powerful means of creating Win32 Applications.
content/index.html Content
samples/index.html Samples
reference/index.html Reference
2Getting started with WEL
If you are new to WEL, then the best place to begin is the
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/index.html tutorial which is a series of samples demonstrating the development of a simple WEL system. Also take a look at
/libraries/wel/content/common_concepts/index.html WEL common concepts for details of some common concepts used in WEL programming.
